title: Hola Madrid
description: Imagine finding out your twin sister has betrayed you in the worst possible way…would you stick around for the aftermath, or would you run away and start the new life you always dreamt of?A shocking confession from Nicole’s sister Annie threatens to tear the sisters apart as Nicole runs away to Madrid.Meeting local policeman, Jesé is a welcome distraction but she soon discovers he’s hiding a secret – his girlfriend.Say ‘Hola Madrid’ as Nicole throws herself into speaking Spanish, salsa dancing and begins her journey of self-discovery. Can her new life heal her past heart break? Will the irresistible Jesé make her learn to trust again?
author: Jayne May
